name: california-design-system
description: State of California Design System A work in progress!

scripts.copy: npm run copy:structural && npm run copy:visual && npm run copy:content && npm run copy:navigation
scripts.copy:structural: shx cp -r components/agency-footer components/statewide-footer components/statewide-header components/feedback docs/ds-components/structural/
scripts.copy:content: shx cp -r components/accordion components/button-grid components/feature-card components/page-alert components/regulatory-outline components/step-list docs/ds-components/content/
scripts.copy:navigation: shx cp -r components/back-to-top components/content-navigation components/menu components/pagination components/skip-to-content docs/ds-components/navigation/
scripts.format: npm run format:eslint && npm run format:prettier
scripts.lint: npm run lint:eslint && npm run lint:prettier
